update.name: FileBot 5.1.2
update.title: New updates available
update.message:
FileBot 5.1.2
This release features:
+ Added {plex.year} binding
+ Added {language} binding
+ Added {mediaFileName} binding
+ Added {dovi} binding
+ Support for companion files in Music Mode
+ Improved support for APFS and BTRFS
+ Lots of minor improvements and bug fixes
